reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

description.narrative: 1. Project 11848 IOPT Office #2. Project area and country: Israel and the Occupied Palestinian Territories (IOPT) #3. Project justification: #In 2018, FCAs country program in IOPT will continue working with local youth and women, building resilience of esp ecially vulnerable population segments and strengthening local capacities. Its particular focus will be on expanding and building on the success of the Right to Quality Education work piloted in 2017 in East Jerusalem. The country office established in 201 5 in East Jerusalem enables FCA to work more closely with local partners especially in terms of monitoring and capacity-building, as well as to self-implement if deemed relevant. FCA also plans to strengthen its IOPT staffing to ensure effective implementa tion of the country programme incl. easily available daily support to partners. #4. The main objective and the expected results: #The main objective is the improved effectiveness, quality, and impact of FCAs IOPT country program through field presence. The main expected results include:# PMER of the IOPT country program # Capacity building of FCAs local partners and local institutions # Dialogue with local authorities and various other actors # Networking at the country level # Support and input for communi cation purposes # Broadened access to funding opportunities # Coordination of work and cooperation with other aid organisations # Input of partner organisations and topics from the region into the lobby and advocacy work # Active monitoring of the security situation #5. Implementing partner: FCA IOPT country office
